BBEX3.A.ERN.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Eritrea / USD 1 = ERN ... (middle)
General: On 8 November 1997, Eritrea ended its currency union with Ethiopia and adopted the nakfa as its own currency.
Methodology: From November 1997 to March 1999 and from December 2000 calculated on the basis of buying and selling rates, from April 1999 to November 2000 on the basis of month-end middle rates.

Comment on 2001: On 10 September 2001, the nakfa was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate).  7 September 2001: USD 1 = ERN 10.20 / 10.30  10 September 2001: USD 1 = ERN 13,55 / 13,80.  Calculated devaluation:25.0% (middle rate).
